summary:
Adds fake fangs for vampires, for Costom Races.

______________________________

Fügt falsche Fangzähne für Vampire zur Gesichtstextur hinzu, für Costom Races.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/37980-1-1373047525.jpg[/img][/center]


[b]Hi guys, at first sorry for my bad lingo, but i think you know what i mean!

Some guys on Nexus saw some Images from me and asked me where the fang from, here is it. But listen. It is not realy a mod, it is more than a concept art, an idea for a mod, that never go in progress and come to nothing. I know that awsome mod from Acdale (Female have fangs) but you can not see his fangs on your Charakter without console commands to open your mouth. And commands doesn´t work at the last update of Skyrim. Than i create this and it works for me ;)

That´s the reason i will share it with you guys.

________________________________________________________________________________________

You are a modder and like my idea and you will make a true mod of this? Do it, you need no permisssion for this fangs. But let me know this and give me a little credit ;)

________________________________________________________________________________________

This File based on the facetexture [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709/]DIMONIZED UNP female body by dimon99[/url] . It replace femalehead.dds. and adds fangs for Vampires lips, look at the Images.

[color=#ffff00]INSTALLATION[/color]

-For correct work you need a costom race, based on the UNP Body like [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18717/]Temptress Race by Psychos1s and Brokefoot[/url].
(TemptressRaceVampire is great for this, but install it at first and overwrite femalehead with my file, for example.)


-Download my file Manual!!! And extract with RAR anywhere yo want. 2 variants selectable ( NORMAL and BLOODY ) choose one.

-Copy this file (femalehead.dds) to the folder where the body- and headtexture is. "skyrim/data/textures/"NAME OF YOUR COSTOM RACE"/actors/character/female". And say yes to overwrite.

-Done
____________________________

[color=#ff0000]IMPORTANT[/color]

Download with NexusManager is ONLY FOR DEMONSTRATION and you better install at first UNP BODY MOD. My demo adds all women fangs on their lips, that is ok for demostration but not for more.
________________________________________________________________________________________

[color=#ffff00]PROBLEMS?[/color]

Any Problems with Headtextextures or need for Male, CBBE, somthing else?

- download my PSD-File for Photoshop, open it with Photoshop and open headtexture of your orginal Costom Race. Put my Fangs in Costom Race Face and save as DDS.file. You need a DDS-Plugin for Photoshop!

No Photoshop and ugly neckseams on your UNP Body?

-download Head- and BodyTextures from DIMONIZED UNP female body by dimon99. Put all his files in Folder of your costom race where the Bodytex is ("feamalebody_1","feamalehead"....) and copy my file at last in it. And every time say yes for overwrite.

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709/]DIMONIZED UNP female body by dimon99[/url]


______________________________________

Ugly Vampire face?

Try this one:

Normal Dawnguard Vampire Faces by jm220

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21921
________________________________________________________________________________________

[color=#ffff00]OTHER MODS FROM ME


[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28740/]THEHAGs PRIVAT TATTOOS FOR UNP - UNPB[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30404/]THEHAGs PRIVAT TATTOOS FOR CBBE 3.2[/url] [/color]

________________________________________________________________________________________

[color=#ffff00]CREDITS

All credits and big thanks goes to Dimon99 for that awesome Bodymod and the Nexus-crew![/color][/b]
author: THEHAG
